website_summaries.verdict: A perfect choice for those with a sweet tooth who crave a little caffeine kick.
pros: There is a delicious, undeniable Cinnabon aroma
A light roast that is perfect served black or with cream and sugar for more of a dessert taste
The cinnamon bun taste is prominent, but it doesn't completely overpower the taste of coffee
Easily enjoyed in the morning or as an afternoon pick-me-up
cons: The often fluctuating price does get quite high

customer_reviews.title: Cinnabon Flavor & warm coffee smell is great to wake up to (without the Cinnabon Calories!)
customer_reviews.text: I love Cinnabons but only have them 1-2 times a year, usually in an airport. Cinnabon coffee K-cups are a delicious way to add a touch of cinnamon and flavor to ordinary coffee in the morning. The BEST part is my husband sometimes gets up and makes a cup with the Keurig and brings it to me for coffee in bed on a lazy weekend morning. KUDOS to men who like to spoil their wives with little treats like this! I hope someone picks up on this and treats their special someone to Cinnabon coffee in bed - it's nice!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I never liked coffee much until I tried this one! Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 39 years old and have never had a cup of coffee in my life, until I purchased a K cup machine to have for guests, tea and hot chocolate. I ordered a few different flavors and decided to try this one. I’m so in love with this flavor. I’m now an official coffee person. I’m one of those.. I wait there hovering over the machine as it brews..haha. It’s absolutely delicious and I think if flavored coffee is your thing, you’ll love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a case, received a small box. :(
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this coffee but really tired of Amazon not shipping the case correctly. The product is listed as a 72 pack, 6 boxes of 12 cups each. This time I received one individual box of 12 cups. I paid over $30 for 12 Kcups. The process to file a complaint to get the rest of my order is next to impossible. I have no issue paying for my coffee but I want to get my full order.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2LMN

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: I am not at Coffee Gourmet and do not like really strong coffee. I prefer flavored coffee with cream and if I drink regular coffee I use a flavored creamer. I have tried a number of the flavored K-Cups and the Cinnabon in my very favorite. It is even better with the Cinnabon flavored creamer. It has the Cinnabon flavor but is not overpowering or artificial tasting. If you like Cinnabon you may want to give this coffee a try.
customer_reviews.author: NLM4501

customer_reviews.title: Looking to try something new??
customer_reviews.text: Do you love cinnamon rolls?!?!?! Ever think about if you could liquify it? This is like liquid cinnamon bun gold. You can make it as sweet as you want. It's a lighter roast coffee and perfect for an early morning start or a relaxing evening inside. Of course in the winter months it was such an awesome treat to have and share! Keep you and your friends and family nice and toasty!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney D.

customer_reviews.title: Less calories than inhaling a cinnabon
customer_reviews.text: Since fall is now upon us, these cinnabun flavored coffee k cups seemed a good choice. When setting the Keurig to 10oz, I would describe the coffee as light in body with a subtle cinnamon flavor. If you want the cinnamon to be more apparent, set your cup setting down. This kcup wasn't as potent as I thought but it still satisfied the seasonal (and year round) cinnamon bun urge. I have also mixed it with a dark roast to give the coffee some more umph while enhancing it with a slight cinnamon flavor. Overall, its a pleasant cup of smooth coffee and better option than downing a six pack of cinnamon rolls (but maybe not as fun).
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee, need to work on cost
customer_reviews.text: What's there to say? Tastes like it's supposed to, like Cinnabon Cinnamon Rolls. Good flavor and balance, not one ingredient overwhelming or overpowering in anyway. Took 1 star off, due to the pricey cost, and the fact their price fluctuates, sometimes daiy, and we're not just talking pennies and a few cents. It's not as if the beans purchased for this particular batch changed on that given day, if you know anything about the way coffee beans are purchased.
customer_reviews.author: TeeMee (Kraftqueen65)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a coffee buff and this is absolutely my fav!! Just by adding a splash of coconut/almond milk and a couple drops of stevia and It’s like getting a cinnamon roll cappuccino but without the 300 plus calories and xxx grams of sugar!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Gei

customer_reviews.title: Our all-time favorite flavored coffee pod
customer_reviews.text: Our family has been drinking this flavor for several months, and there is no sign of anyone slowing down. We all love it morning after morning, and it pairs well with the different add-ins that we use including nothing at all. This is not a strong hearty coffee, even though it is flavored distinctively, and taste great, so it is definitely not for the hard-core "strong coffee" drinker. It is a lite coffee, and you can see through it, albeit it is not so light that it appears to be another one of those watery do nothing coffees. It is that light coffee that we have been looking for all these years; finally!
customer_reviews.author: Dal

customer_reviews.title: Get this coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this coffee, everyone in my house loves it. I'm obsessed with cinnamon roll anything and I love coffee so this was a great buy for me. It's smooth, rich, creamy and makes it taste like I'm drinking a cinnamon roll. Use it with creamer or without. It's great either way. It comes in a bigger box and inside is neatly packed smaller boxes that have the cinnabon logo on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Miles

customer_reviews.title: So Yummy and Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this Cinnabon Classic Cinnamon Roll coffee. There is a complex, flavorful “base” brew underlying the cinnamon overtones. The cinnamon is not so overpowering as to reduce my enjoyment of the coffee itself. When I select a flavored coffee, I want a great COFFEE with a touch of flavor. I drink my coffee black, so it’s gotta be great. I am not adding anything to doctor up the taste. This coffee needs nothing. Wish I could drink it all day!
customer_reviews.author: Maz-n-blu

customer_reviews.title: Pre-opened box
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite coffee, which I have bought on this site before. This is a first for me, the product arrived in a box with 2 other items- but it was obviously preopened-not opened in a way that could have happened in transit. Will buy this product again, but will double check the seller for this. Good coffee with a nice taste of cinnamon.
customer_reviews.author: pliles

customer_reviews.title: Very bland and nothing out of this world.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I ordered these pods on someone's suggestion but the flavour profile was too light and nothing to wake you up in the morning. It was super dull. I'm definitely not crazy about it. I've tried some light roasts previously and they've packed a punch, but not this one. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ayushi Mody

customer_reviews.title: Buns all day and night!
customer_reviews.text: Working the overnight shift in a hospital just got easier with cinnabon coffee! Smells wonderful, taste is smooth and not overtly sweet. Granted, I drink my coffee black so take that with a grain of salt. But, I am also Bougie...so just buy it and drink it, it's amazeballs!
customer_reviews.author: seksae

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this coffee
customer_reviews.text: This coffee has an amazing Cinnamon flavor which reminds me of Mexican coffee. I didn't detect notes of Vanilla frosting but the Cinnamon flavor definitely comes through. It is a light roast which means it provides a nice jolt of caffeine. A waker-upper but I also enjoy this after a nice meal.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Quick access to coffee
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and use it in a Kreirig machine, which allows me instant access to coffee right when I wake up--thank goodness. I only hit Starbuck's now about twice a month, which is saving me a bundle! The flavor of this coffee is so delicious, I add a little Coffee Mate to intensify the flavor. It tastes exactly like a Cinnabon pastry. Started buying this product years ago, and am glad it has helped me easily kick the Starbucks spending habit!
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee and better value
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this flavor. Hard to find in stores so we were really happy to find 48 count and it was cheaper than buying at grocery store!
customer_reviews.author: Mari44

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. I like light coffee and this isn’t very light to me. The cinnamon flavor is good and it makes a good iced coffee when doused with creamer and the ice waters it down.
customer_reviews.author: Jen7997

customer_reviews.title: Extremely weak flavor
customer_reviews.text: In the pastI have purchased these kcups from walmart in the Cinnabon brand. Those were great. I ordered these because they are a better value. I was expecting the same taste and flavor. It is not at all. Not sure if they are defective, or old or what. Coffee flavor was extremely weak and bitter. I understand these should be a lighter roast, but once brewed it tasted like water with a touch of coffee thrown in. Nothing like the ones I have used before. This was my first time purchasing these through Amazon. I even tried to remove the grounds from the kcup and use in my grounds dispenser, still terrible flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Stone

customer_reviews.title: Everlasting Coffee Sweetness
customer_reviews.text: Everlasting Goodness , this coffee is so yummy it is one of my favorite flavor s .. It is a good taste to have after dinner or lunch .. And some would even like it during morning .. I preferred this flavor in the evening after dinner because of the nice flavor or sweetness provided .. I was very happy with this order and the merchandise was packed great and received when I was suppose to .. Will order here again I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Doorah10

customer_reviews.title: Pass Unfortunately No Flavor
customer_reviews.text: This used to be delicious coffee! Something has changed because I just purchased it again and it has no flavor. I tried making it with less water and it made no difference. Big disappointment :-( ! I’ll go back to Maud’s!
customer_reviews.author: Private Eye

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this coffee!! It's the perfect coffee for my taste, not too strong, not too weak, and doesn't leave a bitter aftertaste like a certain very popular brand does. Even though it's a different flavor, it reminds me of The Panera Bread hazelnut coffee (which I love). I was trying to find a coffee similar to that taste for a long time. I wouldn't necessarily say this coffee has a cinnamon taste, as you normally think of cinnamon. But cinnamon roll, yes. Perfect, yet not too sweet in fact not really sweet at all. The flavor is difficult for me to describe in words. But I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Hands-down my favorite flavored coffee. I'm a cinnamon lover, and this is perfect! The do sell this in the flavored creamers at the store, but not in a sugar-free version. As a diabetic, I can't have sugar, so being able to have cinnabon flavored coffee without spiking my blood sugar is a dream come true.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Tennant

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting coffee ever. My co-worker and I split a large order of it every few months. Usually I use cream and sugar (more than I should!), but this is the one and only coffee I can drink plain. (I admit I still add a little bit of cream and sugar but that's for my sweet tooth.)
customer_reviews.author: Beth M Anderson

customer_reviews.title: love this flavor
customer_reviews.text: this is a wonderful addition to my coffee stores. i drink mostly stronger & some would say more "harsh" brews. this provides a very pleasant alternative. 9/12 update : mixing this with hazelnut, and it is even more delicious. use 8oz haz with 6oz cinn.
customer_reviews.author: grendelskeeper

customer_reviews.title: Cinnabon K cup
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little more expensive than Walmart but I love it and it comes next day also it’s well packed no problems what so ever and of course I love the coffee I order every month usually twice I add a little cinnabon creamer to mine to make it sweet
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and delicious coffee
customer_reviews.text: I uSe this k cup coffee everyday. I love the flavor. Some flavored coffees give me a headache bc of whatever flavoring they use, but this one doesn’t affect me or my husband that way. Love the subtle flavor and the smoothness of the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee Pod on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking this coffee for over 5 years. It is the best you can get. The pricing here is about the same as my local grocery store so the convince of not having to leave the house to get it keeps me buying here!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Wren

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: this is my favorite coffee and I was disappointed when I got one box of 24 and not the full order of 96 that I should have. I marked the 96 count box.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki j

customer_reviews.title: Don’t over do it & you’ll enjoy it better!
customer_reviews.text: The first cups of the Cinnabon Classic Cinnamon Roll K-cup got me excited. It tasted good at first, but as I drank more of them, it tasted more artificial! I’m taking my time drinking them. I drink plain unflavored coffees most times & then will make one of these a couple times a week. I find I enjoy the flavor more.
customer_reviews.author: Gamine

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting coffee, you can actually taste the cinnamon. It's delicious!
customer_reviews.author: KST

customer_reviews.title: I Love these Sugar Free K Cups!
customer_reviews.text: These K Cups are Great Smelling and Have just the right amount of taste for your morning coffee. Just add your favorite Creamer and Sweetner for a Great Cup of morning Coffee.... Would recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My father in law gave us these once and they were fantastic. I bought these when they were a bit cheaper and free shipping. Makes a delicious cup of cinnabon coffee. Tastes great, makes the kitchen smell lovely when brewing. Its my favorite part of waking up. Only thing I don't like is that I can't add these as a Sub & Save item.
customer_reviews.author: J.Ho

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Coffee was good...but I want to say a good 25% of the box the coffee was so diluted it just tastes like water with a little bit of creamer that I put in and that's why I'm only giving it a two stars. Such a disappointment because the coffee wasn't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Happy girl

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my new favorite flavor for the kurig. I orginally got this in a mixed pack of 60 different flavors. This is the only one I sought out to purchase on it's own. I make it iced, and it reminds me of a cinnamon dolce latte.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Cinnamon and Light
customer_reviews.text: Cinnabon Classic Cinnamon Roll, Single Serve Coffee K-Cup Pod, Flavored Coffee 2018 - exactly as expected. Its a light roast with cinnamon flavors. There's a little something else tasty in there for the Cinnabon flavor, but not sure what. I can even use a little less creamer and sugar than I do with regular coffee. This is my favorite k cup now.
customer_reviews.author: nifty0

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor! It isn't a strong coffee, but that's alright with me. The order arrived on time but one of the pods had a big hole in the top - made a mess in the box, but nothing to get upset about.
customer_reviews.author: The Natural

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: I can drink it and feel a tiny taste of cinnamon. You can get this using your own cinnamon. Not sure I'll order again. The coffee flavor and smell was not extraordinary but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Tastes  OK
customer_reviews.text: I made a mistake buying these coffee pods. I thought that they would taste ike cinnamon, but they actually taste more like a sweet roll. I do not think that they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Beeze

customer_reviews.title: Has the rich taste of Cinnamon Buns!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the taste! So many flavored coffees only provide a “hint” of the flavor listed for it, but not so with this coffee. Every cup has the wonderful flavor of Cinnamon Buns! Have bought MANY times!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Clark

customer_reviews.title: My favorite coffee flavor!  Bye Starbucks!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this flavor. I love how it’s a little bit sweet and not super intense like dark roast is. I try to get them on sale but i love this flavor so much, I’m now purchasing in bulk!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren1370

customer_reviews.title: My favorite k-cups!
customer_reviews.text: Was buying these from our local grocery store forever...this is a much better deal and they come right to my door! These are my favorite. Will be back for more. Thanks so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly McKeever

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavor
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big coffee drinker but I have been making these and drinking iced and it's delicious! Great cinnamon flavor and the smell when it's brewing is really great.
customer_reviews.author: Botticelli

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously good
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite Keurig cup. Really, I had to check 3 times that it didn’t have added sugars/calories because it tastes THAT good. And the aroma! Oh, the aroma. As soon as you start your Keurig, your entire kitchen will be filled with the cream-cheesy-sweet-cinnamon-y Cinnabon goodness. Guilt-free way to have a Cinnabon for breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Neeley

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I'm keto, but sometimes miss things like Cinnabon. Now I don't have to because this coffee definitely brings back that Cinnabon flavor without the carbs. Smells wonderful too.
customer_reviews.author: Pika-Steph

customer_reviews.title: I knew Cinnabon Rolls and ma'am you're no Cinnabon roll
customer_reviews.text: Not unlikable just isn't cinnabon roll flavor. All I taste is cinnamon, no buttery cinnamon sugary flavor that makes a Cinnabon roll. So that leaves me a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alfie

customer_reviews.title: Yumm!
customer_reviews.text: I love the cinnamon roll flavors it doesn't have a strong flavor it's just right. You can still taste your coffee plus a light scent of cinnamon. Delicious 😋
customer_reviews.author: bp-richards

customer_reviews.title: My favorite coffee! It has a bit of sweetness that ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite coffee! It has a bit of sweetness that really comes out if you add just a tiny bit of cream. This is dessert in a cup!
customer_reviews.author: MegzETop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Cinnamon Roll Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome flavor...hint of cinnamon but not overpowering. This is my new favorite after some genius at Keirig decided to discontinue chocolate glazed donut. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Damon Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great light roast!
customer_reviews.text: I personally love a light roast cup of coffee so this was delicious for me! It has just enough cinnabon flavor to be enjoyable but you aren't sick of the flavor by the time you finish the cup.
customer_reviews.author: KLuv

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This cinnamon taste is light yet one of the best flavored coffees out there. A well bodied mass produced coffee that i will reorder time and time again. Fills the kitchen with an awesome cinnamon smell and great cup of coffee
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: It's okay... We shifted back to the slightly more expensive Starbucks Cinnamon Dolche (and I'm not a fan of supporting that franchise either)
customer_reviews.author: Richard C

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU LIKE CINNABON...
customer_reviews.text: I am not a coffee connoisseur but the Cinnabon coffee has a wonderful aroma and taste. I am not always in the mood for it but it is tasty, when I want a cinnamon flavor fix. The price is adequate for the amount of product received.
customer_reviews.author: 3GIRLSMOM

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Coffee K-Cup
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite coffee as far as K-Cups go. I have a cup every morning before work and one on the way. It seems to be more expensive at the grocery stores so value for money is good. Love the smell in the morning. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Had at a friend's house and had to buy some right away for mine! If you like cinnamon flavors I recommend you try with. If you use creamer and sweeteners, you should use unflavored creamer as to not cover the taste of this coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron L

customer_reviews.title: Cinnabon aroma is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The aroma is so rich, I expect to gain weight just smelling it (but there are no calories). And the flavor is very smooth. This is now my favorite coffee. I don't have to add any flavoring to it.
customer_reviews.author: Scot A. Shier

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased these before an the same Amy for -$5 cheaper. Outside of the price lift this coffee is amazing an by far my favorite to enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: PureRomance by Taya

customer_reviews.title: Good product --
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite flavors of K cup. I'm glad I can resupply via Amazon instead of having to shop around to find a store that has it in stock.
customer_reviews.author: NJLightningbug

customer_reviews.title: A holistic brew!
customer_reviews.text: This is just like fresh cafe brews ! Love the cinnamon flavor and even better, cinnamon helps keep insulin regulated better.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and value
customer_reviews.text: It does taste like Cinnabon, it’s not a strong flavor but subtle, which is why I like it. I will definitely buy it again when I run out of this box.
customer_reviews.author: Ajer

customer_reviews.title: Cinnamons 🤗
customer_reviews.text: Very nice smooth flavor! I love the cinnamon aroma and you can really taste it as well. Very good purchase on my end!
customer_reviews.author: Indigogirl

customer_reviews.title: Hated it
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted to like this coffee but I do not. I can’t tell what it tastes like but not like Cinnabons. It was waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: KITTYCAT

customer_reviews.title: Best Cinnamon K-Cups on the Market
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for smooth strong cinnamon taste and smell, these are the K-cups for you. I have tried the following competitor's: - Timothy's Cinnamon Pastry Cup - Cinnamon Subway by Brooklyn Beans Nothing compares to the Cinnabon K-cups. The rest were a waste of money and I ended up giving them away to people at work. While these K-cups are brewing, the smell is irresistible. The taste is then even better.
customer_reviews.author: Turk

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like Cinnabon
customer_reviews.text: Sweet with vanillay frosting flavor and a definite cinnamon roll flavor, this is a very sweet dessert coffee. Do not expect subtlety. This is true to its name. If you love flavored coffee drinks this will be your thing.
customer_reviews.author: Author Sable Sylvan (Heather Davies)

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: These are such a treat. They are cheaper then buying at the store in the smaller boxes. I can not tell that they are “light roast”
customer_reviews.author: Fattiesmama

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to, great cup of coffee. Love the subtle cinnamon flavor. Not overwhelming but good smooth taste.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee taste.
customer_reviews.text: I order these from Amazon because they’re difficult to purchase anywhere else. The flavor is just outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: H. Likar

customer_reviews.title: It's not quite what i expected
customer_reviews.text: Essentially this is just coffee with a lot of cinnamon in it. I can do that with a much less expensive k cup.
customer_reviews.author: Tre

customer_reviews.title: My favorite K Kup as well
customer_reviews.text: I agree with all the positive reviews. While I love variety in flavored coffee, I always come back to this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grim

customer_reviews.title: Great Kcups for your brewer
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast on this product . Had it within a few days . Packaged nice and you get a lot for your price . I really love this flavor of kpods that they offer . It tastes just like a cinnamon roll from the cinnabon shop . you get alot of kcups for this price and they are on the bigger side so it's nice to get a full cup of coffee off these kpods . I would recommend these to anyone looking for good coffee with a amazing taste .
customer_reviews.author: Anggie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I add a small spoon of brown sugar to this to make it a bit less bitter. Always looking for that brown sugar taste
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, a little mild.
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor, I only wish it was a bit stronger. It would be perfect if it came in bagged form so I could adjust the strength.
customer_reviews.author: Kevasa

customer_reviews.title: Please add Decaf options
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee, it's all I drink. However, since it's so good and so addicting I wish you guys had decaf versions so I'm not getting overloaded with caffeine everyday.
customer_reviews.author: carol baskin

customer_reviews.title: This really tastes like Cinnabon even though I only use cream and no ...
customer_reviews.text: This really tastes like Cinnabon even though I only use cream and no sugar. I'm sure if you added sugar or a sweetened creamer you would get more of the Cinnabon experience. It's very smooth and you can still taste the coffee flavor. This might be one of my favorite flavored coffees now
customer_reviews.author: Amac

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee! It is a bit expensive though but I think it tastes amazing! Delivery was awesome as well!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: The best ever
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a little squished. But this is my favourite coffee. My roommate and I take turns buying it because it’s both our favourites.
customer_reviews.author: Krh

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: If you love cinnamon and coffee, here is the beat of both. Simply delicious. I’m on my second box.. love it Hot or cold I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Very good coffee. I pair it with the cinnabon creamer for extra creamy satisfaction. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorites but it is so expensive in the grocery. This lowered the cost by pod and gave me plenty to keep on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet
customer_reviews.text: I think it tasted very sweet ! I loved it but it’s very different tasting now.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON WIEN

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee. I've tried other cinnamon flavored coffee, but nothing beats this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product! The flavor is amazing and the price great. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Weak flavor
customer_reviews.text: The cinnamon flavor not only weak but varies from cup to cup. Early aroma but for drinking you're left with a so-so coffee.
customer_reviews.author: GeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these K-cups - so much so they can be a bit addictive. Wish they were cheaper, but the flavor is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Borgen

customer_reviews.title: I have a coffee problem
customer_reviews.text: It’s so good if you put creamer and/or titanium syrup with it. Like making your own coffee with these pods is way cheaper than Starbucks, Dutch bros, and black rock.
customer_reviews.author: Kittio

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor, and the smell
customer_reviews.text: Just enough of the Cinnamon smell when brewing your coffee. Love the flavor and have used this exact K-Cup for almost a decade.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Leadingham

customer_reviews.title: Cinnabon K cups are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Cinnabon K cups are my favorite and my go-to every day. I also like vanilla, but to be honest, it's been Cinnabon only for a few weeks now!
customer_reviews.author: Peace2020

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Too much cinnamon flavor for me. I like Cinnabon’s but not the coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Finn

customer_reviews.title: Black Coffee Matters
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee to drink black. No carbs. Joe Biden's favorite coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is great, whole family loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had this coffee when I visited her in Alaska. I absolutely love the flavor, strength of coffee and I think it’s delicious. I find I want to have a couple of cups a day, but that’s a ok. Highly recommend if you enjoy mild cinnamon
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Lanford

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love that particular flavor... found the same product much cheaper at different store near my house.... on special sale of course
customer_reviews.author: Luis R Roman

customer_reviews.title: BEST FOR LIQUID DESSERTS
customer_reviews.text: Why not? This fills the void for those that crave for the high calorie, trans fat and sticky buns whereas you can have it in a cup!
customer_reviews.author: MsSoandSo

customer_reviews.title: Weird
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but my box for the coffee pods were open on the side
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Wow...
customer_reviews.text: Just brewed my first cup & am very impressed. Coffee smells amazing while brewing. Added 1 stevia packet, 1 tbsp of Skinny Girl Sugar Free Brown Sugar Cinnamon syrup, a little almond milk creamer, & a dash of Ceylon cinnamon. Perfection in a cup.
customer_reviews.author: January Contreras

customer_reviews.title: One of the best!
customer_reviews.text: Personally my favorite coffee k-pod flavor as well as my boyfriends. We love this flavor! I would reccommend trying it. We usually pair it with french vanilla creamer.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Extremely yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this flavor! Cinnamon flavor is nice and strong, and I added vanilla creamer. Totally a morning win!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best value I’ve found for K-cups (the same price as Keurig’s website). My favorite flavor! It is very light though. My husband prefers a darker roast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible flavor
customer_reviews.text: It taste fake; I am very disappointed. The aroma is lovely but it has pungent artificial flavor. Not what I expected..especially from Cinnabon. I tried multiple cups to force myself to like it; until I just gave up. Thumbs down
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great value and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Actually comes in a box that has small boxes of 12 cups. Thought it would be just one large box but this is a great value for the amount and is delicious. IG: @CLHEEKZ
customer_reviews.author: C.E.S.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite coffee! I have this every morning. I’ve tried other brands and they just aren’t the same.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

product_meta.title: Cinnabon Classic Cinnamon Roll, Single-Serve Keurig K-Cup Pods, Flavored Coffee, 24 Count
product_meta.description: Size:24 Count| Style:Classic Cinnamon RollWe start with a smooth, light-roast brew and swirl in the decadent flavors of Cinnamon , brown sugar, and, of course, our legendary frosting. Take a sip and delight in the taste of our world famous cinnamon rolls, hot out of the oven. It’s a cup of delicious perfection.
feature_bullets: Swirled with Cinnamon cinnamon, brown sugar, and frosting
